name: spatula
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a cooking utensil with a wide, flat blade that is not sharp, used especially for lifting food out of pans
horiyan/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
UK (US tongue depressor) a small piece of wood used by a doctor to hold someone's tongue down in order to examine their mouth or throat
